If you're willing to have all of your tests subclass from an AbstractTestCa=
se, then you can do this fairly simply.  In your AbstractTestCase, just ove=
rride run(TestResult) and run().  In the body of the first, register your T=
estListener on the TestResult and call super.run().  In the second, create =
a new TestResult and pass it to the first.
